Service Details: - Maintains the 31 Regional Parks and plans future recreational opportunities through parkland acquisition and development- Offers larger natural area parks that demonstrate important landscapes of our region and provide opportunities for outdoor activities- Offers free interpretive programs for schools and community groups in most Regional Parks- Several parks have heritage buildings or artifacts- Please call to find out how you can get involved
Address & Map: 1450 KLO RdKelowna, BC     V1W 2K8View MapQuest Map
Major Intersection: KLO Rd and St Amand Rd
Accessibility: Please visit website for a listing of wheelchair accessible parks
